Summary: As me and my family drove home in my neighborhood some metallic object caught my eye and caused us to stop driving and look.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around July 31st 2010
divs: sighting detailssaturday 7\31\10 @ aprox 1 to 2:30 pm my family and i were driving back home through are neighborhood as i saw a small shiny metallic triangular object high in the sky on the westside of madera.at first i thought it was a airplane or jet but it made no noise and was way to high for any ordinary aircraft.as i became excited the rest of my family wanted to see so we drove in reverse and stopped in the middle of the road to watch tis thing and try to make sense of what this was that we were all witnessing.it sort of hovered for a few seconds so high in the clear sky only a few clouds around it.we watched it slowly go slightly left then right it quickly dissapeared in to the air then reapered then dissapered agin this time it was he last time we saw it. it just quickly vanished into the blue sky like it was never there, no evidence whatsoever.me and family didnt know what we had just seen only that we might have just seen a ufo.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
